content: 21-30 single_crochet in the next ch1 loop ch1 repeat around you can adjust the height by adding or subtracting rounds brim of hat 31 single_crochet in each single_crochet and ch1 loop 2sc in each ch3 loop around 32 2sc in next single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat around note if you prefer a less ruffly brim do 2sc in next single_crochet single_crochet in the next 2sc repeat around for this round 33 single_crochet in each single_crochet 34 2sc in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 5sc repeat around 35 single_crochet in each single_crochet 36 single_crochet in next single_crochet skip next 2 single_crochet ch3 repeat around 37 single_crochet in next ch3 loop ch3 repeat around end with single_crochet in the last ch3 loop then slip_stitch in next single_crochet i hope you have fun with this pattern if you have any questions or comments please feel free to contact me at rustysarah@comcast net or send me a message on ravelry i am msbusyfingers copyright 2010 sarah margaret crittenden all rights reserved
